name: Charjabug

evolution.description: Charjabug can evolve into Vikavolt at level 12 and above with the help of a Thunder Stone. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Battery Pokémon. It buries itself in fallen leaves and barely moves, munching away on humus. If you accidentally step on one, you’ll get a shock!

abilities.name: Battery
abilities.description: Allies that activate electric-type moves within 20 feet of this Pokémon double their damage dice.
